page.title: 19Pastimes
page.content:
There is no recreation centre in our area but we do have some sports.
The old railway line was laid about 60 years ago and ran from Himley through Blakely,Giggetty,Wombourne, and Lower Penn to Wolverhampton. It was dismantled 20 years ago.It is now used for cycling, horse riding, and walking.The Wombourne station is now used as a tourist office. Pool Hall pool in Lower Penn is an 11 acre area of water used in the 18th as an overflow century as an overflow for the Staffs & Worcs canal. It is now used for commercial angling. There is a smaller pool to the south owned by GKN Sankey angling club. There is a hockey club near Wombourne.
